title: Meet The Un-Conservatives
itunes:title: Meet The Un-Conservatives
description:
With the government bailing out a private company, and the latest gloomy retail data showing a lack of confidence from shoppers, what happened to the Conservatives we used to know? David Merritt, Bloomberg's senior executive editor, and reporter Charlotte Ryan join Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek to discuss. Plus, Rebecca Hildenrath, CEO of the Equalities and Human Rights Commission, explains the perils of a lack of robust LGBT inclusion policies in the City.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
